TextLibrary.Text: 'Tis the final piece, lad, the FINAL piece o' the Great Machine. Me detector's all lit up like a Dwarf's face in an alehouse, and...

Oh, aye. North of us, near a castle owned by the Dark Dwarves. That'd be right, them havin' the last piece, hidin' it all these years. Why it makes me wanna...
